I play the piano, but only at home because caffeine makes my hands shake.
I don't use social media very much, because it's not my style.
i am blonde.

participant_2.background:
I help my grandparents with their daily activities.
i just accepted a job at the elementary school in my hometown.
I live on a farm with my mom who works in telecommunications.
i have 3 dogs and a parrot.
I just docked my boat after a long journey around the world.

content.text: Hello! How's your day going?
Hi! It's going great! I just docked my boat after a long journey around the world.
Wow, that's amazing! Where did you go?
I went to all sorts of places, including Europe, Asia, and South America.
That sounds like an amazing experience! I'm jealous.
It was really great! I'm glad I got to do it.
So what are you going to do now?
I'm going to take a few weeks off and relax, and then I'm going to start my new job at the elementary school in my hometown.
That sounds like a great plan. I'm sure you'll be a great teacher.
Thanks! I'm excited to start.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, go on hikes, and play piano.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to go on hikes too.
Me too! They're a great way to get outside and enjoy nature.
What's your favorite place to hike?
I love hiking in the mountains. The views are amazing!
Me too! I love being up in the mountains.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a tea enthusiast. I love trying new teas and learning about the different cultures that they come from.
That sounds really interesting! I've never tried tea before.
You should! There are so many different kinds of tea, and they're all delicious.
I'll have to try it sometime!
You won't regret it!
Thanks for the recommendation!
